if you don‚Äôt spend your life in near constant physical pain then you probably don‚Äôt appreciate a six day respite. trust me, it‚Äôs huge!
this isn‚Äôt a dependency or addiction thing. just knowing that i‚Äôm recovering and can be pain free from time to time.
plus i‚Äôve only just taken paracetamol rather than the tramadol that i‚Äôve been on for eight months.
alas, my shoulder flared up again this morning but knowing that there will be times when i don‚Äôt need them. warms the soul a lot.
but i didn‚Äôt need to take them for that long which is massive for me.
unfortunately, with the arthritic shoulder and other things, it was never going to be a longer break than that.
six days without painkillers after fifteen months on taking very strong painkillers multiple times a day. felt much better.
i told the cats they were getting roast chicken for dinner tonight. that would explain the four pairs of eyes watching my every movement.
apparently i dared to enter my own bedroom!
